description: Astrological rules for selecting auspicious dates for starting foreign or long-distance travel.
special_notes: Favour Wednesdays and Thursdays ruled by Mercury and Jupiter — both planets of travel and wisdom.
Prefer Punarvasu, Swati, and Anuradha Nakshatras — these are auspicious for journeys and returns.
Avoid travel during Bhadra Karan and Rahu Kaal.
If Moon is in airy sign (Gemini, Libra, Aquarius) and Jupiter unafflicted, results are highly favorable.
Start travel during Shukla Paksha and if possible during Abhijit Muhurta for long-term success abroad.
